content: Lifestyle Asked by Casey ChooAsked on 26 Nov 2018Which martial arts academy alternative to Evolve MMA do you recommend?Had my 1st trial lesson at Evolve MMA this weekend! While it was a ton of fun (.... & pain), the up-front costs for a 1 year membership is too much - almost $4200 a year! Any other options to recommend?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 26 Nov 2018Lol. I would recommend Fitness Bravo. (A personal training gym which I go now) but it's not MMA. It's more of the typical gym stuff, for now!)Or signing up to GuavaPass and getting the monthly sessions. You can try out the trial first, I believe there are also the MMA activities you can do also.0 comments0
